meanings.sent1: She wore the barmiest hat to the party, with feathers and bells.
meanings.sent2: The clown's barmiest antics always made the children laugh.
meanings.sent3: His barmiest idea was to wear socks on his hands instead of gloves.
meanings.sent4: The barmiest character in the play was a talking tree.
meanings.sent5: The barmiest thing she did was try to ride a unicycle while juggling.

meanings.definition: Characterized by wild or erratic behavior
meanings.sent1: The barmiest squirrel in the park kept stealing picnic food.
meanings.sent2: The barmiest roller coaster in the amusement park had loops and twists.
meanings.sent3: The barmiest dog at the shelter could never sit still for a photo.
meanings.sent4: The barmiest storm of the year brought strong winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The barmiest dance move she did involved spinning on her head.
